original_title: Morning Days 8 - Takahashi Ai, Niigaki Risa FC Tour in 白馬
overview: Fanclub event DVD featuring Morning Musume. 5th generation members Takahashi Ai and Niigaki Risa. It features their 2011 bus tour that ran from July 2nd through 3rd, 2011 in Hakuba. Disc 1 (102mins), Disc 2 (60mins).
title: Morning Days 8 - Takahashi Ai, Niigaki Risa FC Tour in Hakuba
